transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji, haanji, Ekta baat kar rahi hu. Sir se baat hui na aapki?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Haanji, haanji, haanji. Toh unhone mujhe kuch aapki catalog pe karne ke liye bataya tha. Yeh aapka ek kuch products mein na sirf primary category added hai. Dekho uski wajah se na aapko irrelevancy aa rahi hai. Agar aap chahte ho rakhna hai toh main rakh deti hu, otherwise hum ise yaha se hata dete hai. Toh main aapko naam bata rahi hu.
Customer: Haan, bata dijiye.
Executive: Ek aapka hai yeh straightening machine karke hai sir. Isme bhi aapne buyleads consume ki hui hai. Sheet straightening machine ka basically.
Customer: Haan, sir sahi hai woh.
Executive: Toh main usme sheet straightening machine add kar deti hu, theek hai?
Customer: Haan, haan. Haan, wohi wohi chahiye. Sheet straightening machine chahiye.
Executive: Sheet straightening ka. Theek, theek, theek sir. Ek minute aur rukiyega. Ek do products aur the aapke. Crimping machine ka bhi hai sir ek.
Customer: Haan, woh bhi sahi hai.
Executive: Toh abhi usme kya hai sir? Yeh toh roof sheet crimping machine ya toh sheet crimping machine.
Executive: Sir crimping machine dala hua hai sir. Uski wajah se har type ka main bata rahi hu uski wajah se kya ho raha hai na har type ka crimping machine ho gaya jaise hair crimping machine bhi hota hai, hair straightening machine bhi hota hai woh sab bhi hota hai woh beech mein aa jata hai.
Customer: Haan toh roofing sheet wali category aapke matlab andar se.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Sorry kyunki isme ek category already dali hui hai aapki horizontal crimping machine ki, theek hai?
Customer: Haan lekin aapke paas jo main banata hu uski category nahi hai toh phir main base category ka hi selection karunga.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi category hai na sir hot crimping machine ka dala hua hai category aapka.
Customer: Hot crimping ka nahi bech raha hu. Sheet, sheet.
Executive: Sorry horizontal ka main bata rahi hu. Sorry, sorry. Horizontal crimping machine ka dala hua hai along with aapki.
Customer: Woh sahi hai. Roof sheet. Woh sahi hai na?
Customer: Roof sheet crimping machine aisa kuch hai?
Executive: Main check kar leti hu roof sheet ka.
Executive: Sheet crimping ka. Ya toh aap thodi der ke baad mujhe call kar sakte hai. Kaam mein hu.
Customer: Kitni der bataiye? Haan, kitni der bataiye?
Executive: Haan, 15 din ke, 15 minute ke baad call kijiye.
Executive: 15 minute mein. Theek hai alright koi dikkat nahi sir main abhi call. Haan woh direct hataye mat mere kehne ke baad hataye kyunki aapke paas woh available nahi hai toh isliye maine mana kar diya.
Executive: Accha, accha. Nahi, nahi dekho jaise crimping machine available hai lekin usme phir woh different different type ki crimping machine aa rahe hai.
Customer: Haan woh aap list nikal ke rakhiye aur.
Executive: Toh maine. Haan, theek hai, theek hai. Horizontal ka maine isme add kar hi diya hai, don't worry.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir toh aapko 15 minute mein call back karte hai, theek hai? Ab waha par call ka option aa jayega.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs specific crimping machine category.

- Customer wants to remove irrelevant categories.



Resolution:

- Executive added sheet straightening machine category.

- Executive confirmed horizontal crimping machine category exists.

- Executive will call back in 15 minutes.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- category, crimping machine, straightening machine, buyleads
